data.expected_result: Guild list should scroll with arrow keys
data.short_description: Guild list doesn't scroll with arrow keys (after clicking) on desktop Firefox
data.steps_to_repro: - Open the Discord app in the Firefox browser - Click any non-occupied area of the guild list (the background) - Press up or down arrow keys (it should scroll, but nothing occurs)
